sentences.sContent: Already he had begun to forget them, and Shepperton soon became an extraordinary aviary, filled with birds of every species.
sentences.sContent_eng: Already he had begun to forget them, and Shepperton soon became an extraordinary aviary, filled with birds of every species.
sentences.sCn: 他已经把那些邻居们给忘记了，谢伯顿不久就变成了一个特别的鸟类饲养场，拥有各类品种的鸟。

remMethod.val: avi (鸟) + ary (场所) → 大型鸟舍

trans.tranOther: a large  cage  where birds are kept
